pdftron.PDF

Interface PDFViewCtrl.TextSearchListener

  • Enclosing class:
    PDFViewCtrl

    public static interface PDFViewCtrl.TextSearchListener
    Used for receiving notifications in UI thread during the process of text search. A text search thread can be started via findText().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTextSearchEnd(int result)
      Called in UI thread after the text search thread stops.
      void onTextSearchProgress(int progress)
      Called regularly in UI thread while the text search thread is running.
      void onTextSearchStart()
      Called in UI thread immediately before the text search thread begins.

    • Method Detail

      • onTextSearchStart

        void onTextSearchStart()
        Called in UI thread immediately before the text search thread begins.

      • onTextSearchProgress

        void onTextSearchProgress(int progress)
        Called regularly in UI thread while the text search thread is running. This is useful for UI updating, say a progress bar.
        Parameters:
        progress - progress indicator in the range [0, 100].

      • onTextSearchEnd

        void onTextSearchEnd(int result)
        Called in UI thread after the text search thread stops.
        Parameters:
        result - search result. Possible values are:
        • PDFViewCtrl.TEXT_SEARCH_NOT_FOUND;
        • PDFViewCtrl.TEXT_SEARCH_FOUND;
        • PDFViewCtrl.TEXT_SEARCH_CANCELED.
        • PDFViewCtrl.TEXT_SEARCH_INVALID_INPUT
